+authentication, it does not use encryption, so your login credentials

+arbitrary Internet traffic, so changing the above settings to expose it
+to the Internet (even using something like a Tor hidden service) could
+expose you to unconsidered vulnerabilities.  See `bitcoind -help` for
+more information about these settings and other settings described in
+this document.

+

+restarts and puts them into a file readable only by the user that
